issue.title: [CF 1206] Arena target alert.
issue.body:
Is there a way to make alert sound, when 2 or more enemys target me on arena?


> Posted by CurseForge user Hearthstonemakesmemad | Imported from CurseForge issue #1206 | Raw

comments.body:
Make a sound notification with an On Condition Set Passing or While Condition Set Passing trigger. Set the condition to check the following (which will work for 2s and 3s - 5s is being removed in Legion anyway):

``` ( Unit Is Unit -> player & arena1target AND Unit is Unit -> player & arena2target ) OR ( Unit Is Unit -> player & arena2target AND Unit is Unit -> player & arena3target ) OR ( Unit Is Unit -> player & arena1target AND Unit is Unit -> player & arena3target ) ```
Edited Jul 16, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
